abi: function getUserMiners(address user) view returns (tuple(address owner, uint256 purchasePrice, uint256 powerLevel, uint256 purchaseTime, uint256 renewalTime, bool active)[])
function getLockedRewards(address user) view returns (tuple(uint256 amount, uint256 releaseTime)[])
event MinerBought(address indexed user, uint256 indexed minerId, uint256 price, uint256 powerLevel, address indexed referrer)
event RewardClaimed(address indexed user, uint256 unlockedAmount, uint256 lockedAmount, uint256 timestamp)
event ReferralReward(address indexed referrer, address indexed downline, uint256 level, uint256 amount)
